name: OldiesXLcom
0:
”Alexa, ask oldies x. l. what's playing.”
”Alexa, ask oldies x. l. to play live.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: oldies x. l.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Oldies XL is Epic Radio's signature IP radio station playing 60's, 70's, & 80's all in one place. Ordinary radio has become old sounding, voice-tracked and no longer relevant in a streaming age. OIdies XL has legendary air talent Big Jay Sorensen on weekdays from 10 to 2. Oldies XL with Your Music The Best Music.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
